original: 隨是經典所流布處，是地分中敷師子座，令說法者坐其座上廣演宣說是妙經典。
analyzed: 隨是經典所流布處，是地分中敷師子座，令說法者坐其座上廣演宣說是妙經典。
translated: Wherever this sūtra spreads, in those places, set up a lion seat and have the Dharma preacher sit on that seat to extensively expound this wonderful sūtra.

original: 我當在中常作宿衛，隱蔽其身於法座下頂戴其足，我聞法已得服甘露無上法味增益氣力。
analyzed: 我當在中常作宿衛，隱蔽其身於法座下頂戴其足，我聞法已得服甘露無上法味增益氣力。
translated: I will always be their guard, concealing my body beneath the Dharma seat, supporting their feet. Having heard the Dharma, I will be able to partake of the unsurpassed sweet dew of the Dharma flavor and increase my vital energy.

original: 而此大地深十六萬八千由旬，從金剛際至海地上，悉得眾味增長具足，豐壤肥濃過於今日。
analyzed: 而此大地深十六萬八千由旬，從金剛際至海地上，悉得眾味增長具足，豐壤肥濃過於今日。
translated: This great earth, sixteen thousand and eight hundred yojanas deep, from the adamantine base to the surface of the ocean, will all obtain abundant flavors and grow to fullness, more fertile and rich than today.

original: 以是之故，閻浮提內藥草、樹木、根莖、枝葉、華果滋茂，美色、香味皆悉具足。
analyzed: 以是之故，閻浮提內藥草、樹木、根莖、枝葉、華果滋茂，美色、香味皆悉具足。
translated: For this reason, the medicinal herbs, trees, roots, stems, branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits in Jambudvīpa will flourish, with beautiful colors, flavors, and fragrances all complete.

original: 眾生食已，增長壽命、色力辯安、六情諸根具足通利、威德顏貌端嚴殊特。
analyzed: 眾生食已，增長壽命、色力辯安、六情諸根具足通利、威德顏貌端嚴殊特。
translated: When sentient beings eat them, their lifespans will increase, and they will have good complexion, strength, eloquence, comfort, and their six faculties will be complete and sharp, with majestic virtue and an upright and extraordinary appearance.

original: 成就如是種種等已，所作事業多得成辦，有大勢力，精懃勇猛。
analyzed: 成就如是種種等已，所作事業多得成辦，有大勢力，精懃勇猛。
translated: Having accomplished such various things, they will be able to accomplish many tasks, with great power, diligent and courageous.

original: 「是故，世尊！
analyzed: 「是故，世尊！
translated: Therefore, World-Honored One!

original: 閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，一切眾生多受快樂，應心適意隨其所樂。
analyzed: 閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，一切眾生多受快樂，應心適意隨其所樂。
translated: In Jambudvīpa, it will be peaceful and prosperous, with a flourishing population. All beings will experience much happiness, according to their wishes and desires.

original: 是諸眾生得是威德大勢力已，能供養是金光明經，及恭敬供養受持經者四部之眾，我於爾時當往其所，為諸眾生受快樂故，請說法者廣令宣布如是妙典。
analyzed: 是諸眾生得是威德大勢力已，能供養是金光明經，及恭敬供養受持經者四部之眾，我於爾時當往其所，為諸眾生受快樂故，請說法者廣令宣布如是妙典。
translated: When these beings have attained such majestic power and strength, they will be able to make offerings to the Golden Light Sūtra and respectfully make offerings to the fourfold assembly who uphold the sūtra. At that time, I will go to their place and, in order to bring happiness to all beings, I will request the Dharma teachers to widely proclaim this wonderful sūtra.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是金光明若廣說時，我及眷屬所得威德倍過於常，增長身力，心進勇銳。
analyzed: 是金光明若廣說時，我及眷屬所得威德倍過於常，增長身力，心進勇銳。
translated: When the Golden Light is widely expounded, I and my retinue will attain majestic power that is twice the usual, increasing our physical strength and making our minds vigorous and courageous.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我服甘露無上味已，閻浮提地——縱廣七千由旬——豐壤倍常。
analyzed: 我服甘露無上味已，閻浮提地——縱廣七千由旬——豐壤倍常。
translated: After I have imbibed the unsurpassed flavor of the nectar, the land of Jambudvīpa, extending seven thousand yojanas long and wide, will be twice as fertile as usual.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 如此大地，眾生所依，悉能增長一切所須之物；
analyzed: 如此大地，眾生所依，悉能增長一切所須之物；
translated: Just as this great earth, which is the support of sentient beings, is able to increase and grow all the necessary things;

original: 增長一切所須物已，令諸眾生隨意所用，受於快樂。
analyzed: 增長一切所須物已，令諸眾生隨意所用，受於快樂。
translated: Having increased and grown all the necessary things, it allows sentient beings to use them as they wish and experience happiness.

original: 種種飲食、衣服、臥具、宮殿、屋宅、樹木、林苑、河、池、泉、井，如是等物因依於地悉皆具足。
analyzed: 種種飲食、衣服、臥具、宮殿、屋宅、樹木、林苑、河、池、泉、井，如是等物因依於地悉皆具足。
translated: Various kinds of food and drink, clothing, bedding, palaces, houses, trees, groves, rivers, ponds, springs, wells, and so forth - all these things are complete, relying on the earth.

original: 是故，世尊！
analyzed: 是故，世尊！
translated: Therefore, World-Honored One!

original: 是諸眾生為知我恩應作是念：
analyzed: 是諸眾生為知我恩應作是念：
translated: These sentient beings, in order to know my kindness, should think like this:

original: 『我當畢定聽受是經，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆。
analyzed: 『我當畢定聽受是經，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆。
translated: 'I will definitely listen to and accept this sutra, make offerings, respect, honor, and praise it.'

original: 』作是念已，即從住處——若城邑、聚落、舍宅、空地——往法會所聽受是經。
analyzed: 』作是念已，即從住處——若城邑、聚落、舍宅、空地——往法會所聽受是經。
translated: Having had this thought, they will then leave their dwelling places - whether cities, towns, villages, houses, or open spaces - and go to the Dharma assembly to listen to and accept this sutra.

original: 既聽受已，還其所止，各應相慶作如是言：
analyzed: 既聽受已，還其所止，各應相慶作如是言：
translated: Having listened to and accepted it, they will return to their abodes and should rejoice with each other, saying:

original: 『我等今者聞此甚深無上妙法，已為攝取不可思議功德之聚、值遇無量無邊諸佛、三惡道報已得解脫、於未來世常生天上人中受樂。
analyzed: 『我等今者聞此甚深無上妙法，已為攝取不可思議功德之聚、值遇無量無邊諸佛、三惡道報已得解脫、於未來世常生天上人中受樂。
translated: 'We now, having heard this most profound and unsurpassed wondrous Dharma, have already taken up an inconceivable aggregate of merit and virtue, encountered immeasurable and boundless buddhas, attained liberation from the retributions of the three evil destinies, and will always be reborn in the heavens and among humans in the future to experience happiness.'

original: 』是諸眾生各於住處，若為他人演說是經——若說一喻、一品、一緣，若復稱嘆一佛、菩薩、一四句偈，乃至一句、及稱是經首題名字——世尊！
analyzed: 』是諸眾生各於住處，若為他人演說是經——若說一喻、一品、一緣，若復稱嘆一佛、菩薩、一四句偈，乃至一句、及稱是經首題名字——世尊！
translated: These sentient beings, each in their own dwelling place, if for the sake of others expound this sūtra—if they speak of a single parable, a single chapter, a single cause and condition, or praise a single buddha, bodhisattva, or four-line verse, or even a single line, and proclaim the title of this sūtra—World-Honored One!

original: 隨是眾生所住之處，其地具足，豐壤肥濃過於餘地；
analyzed: 隨是眾生所住之處，其地具足，豐壤肥濃過於餘地；
translated: Wherever these sentient beings dwell, the land there will be replete, fertile, and rich, surpassing other lands;

original: 凡是因地所生之物悉得增長，滋茂廣大；
analyzed: 凡是因地所生之物悉得增長，滋茂廣大；
translated: all things that grow from the earth will increase and flourish, becoming vast and abundant;

original: 令諸眾生受於快樂，多饒財寶，好行惠施，心常堅固深信三寶。
analyzed: 令諸眾生受於快樂，多饒財寶，好行惠施，心常堅固深信三寶。
translated: causing sentient beings to experience happiness, with abundant wealth and treasures, readily practicing generosity, and always firmly believing in the Three Jewels with a sincere mind.

original: 」爾時，佛告地神堅牢：
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告地神堅牢：
translated: At that time, the Buddha told the Earth Deity Firm and Solid:

original: 「若有眾生乃至聞是金光明經一句之義，人中命終隨意往生三十三天。
analyzed: 「若有眾生乃至聞是金光明經一句之義，人中命終隨意往生三十三天。
translated: If sentient beings hear even a single phrase of the meaning of this Golden Light Sūtra, after their human life ends, they will be reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-three according to their wishes.

original: 地神！
analyzed: 地神！
translated: Earth Deity!

original: 若有眾生為欲供養是經典故，莊嚴屋宅，乃至張懸一幡、一蓋、或以一衣，欲界六天已有自然七寶宮殿，是人命終即往生彼。
analyzed: 若有眾生為欲供養是經典故，莊嚴屋宅，乃至張懸一幡、一蓋、或以一衣，欲界六天已有自然七寶宮殿，是人命終即往生彼。
translated: If there are sentient beings who, in order to make offerings to this sūtra, adorn their dwellings, and even hang up a single banner, a single canopy, or a single piece of clothing, in the six heavens of the desire realm, there will already be naturally-occurring seven-jeweled palaces. When these people's lives end, they will be reborn there.

original: 地神！
analyzed: 地神！
translated: Earth Deity!

original: 於諸七寶宮殿之中，各各自然有七天女共相娛樂，日夜常受不可思議微妙快樂。
analyzed: 於諸七寶宮殿之中，各各自然有七天女共相娛樂，日夜常受不可思議微妙快樂。
translated: In each of the seven-jeweled palaces, there will naturally be seven celestial maidens who will entertain them together. Day and night, they will constantly experience inconceivable subtle bliss.

original: 」爾時，地神白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時，地神白佛言：
translated: At that time, the Earth Deity said to the Buddha:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 以是因緣，說法比丘坐法座時，我常晝夜衛護不離，隱蔽其形在法座下頂戴其足。
analyzed: 以是因緣，說法比丘坐法座時，我常晝夜衛護不離，隱蔽其形在法座下頂戴其足。
translated: For these causes and conditions, when the Dharma-preaching bhikṣus sit on the Dharma seat, I will always guard and protect them day and night without leaving, concealing my form beneath the Dharma seat, supporting their feet with my head.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
analyzed: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
translated: If there are sentient beings who have planted various roots of goodness in the presence of hundreds of thousands of Buddhas, this Dharma preacher will, for their sake, widely proclaim and spread this wonderful sutra in Jambudvipa, causing it to not be cut off.

original: 是諸眾生聽是經已，未來之世無量百千那由他劫於天上人中常受快樂，值遇諸佛，疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉斷無餘。
analyzed: 是諸眾生聽是經已，未來之世無量百千那由他劫於天上人中常受快樂，值遇諸佛，疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉斷無餘。
translated: These sentient beings, having listened to this sutra, will in future lives for innumerable hundreds of thousands of kotis of kalpas constantly experience happiness among humans and gods, encounter the Buddhas, quickly attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and completely eliminate the sufferings of the three evil paths without remainder.

original: 」15 散脂鬼神品(六)金光明經散脂鬼神品第十五北涼三藏曇無讖譯爾時，散脂鬼神大將軍及二十八部諸鬼神等，即從坐起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地白佛言：
analyzed: 」15 散脂鬼神品(六)金光明經散脂鬼神品第十五北涼三藏曇無讖譯爾時，散脂鬼神大將軍及二十八部諸鬼神等，即從坐起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地白佛言：
translated: Chapter 15: The Ghost-Spirit Saṃjīva, from the Golden Light Sūtra, translated by Tripiṭaka Master Dharmakṣema of the Northern Liang. At that time, the great general of the ghost-spirits Saṃjīva and the ghost-spirits of the twenty-eight divisions all rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, touched their right knees to the ground, and addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是金光明微妙經典，若現在世及未來世，在在處處——若城邑聚落、若山澤空處、若王宮宅——隨是經典所流布處，我當與此二十八部大鬼神等往至彼所，隱蔽其形隨逐擁護是說法者，消滅諸惡令得安隱；
analyzed: 是金光明微妙經典，若現在世及未來世，在在處處——若城邑聚落、若山澤空處、若王宮宅——隨是經典所流布處，我當與此二十八部大鬼神等往至彼所，隱蔽其形隨逐擁護是說法者，消滅諸惡令得安隱；
translated: Wherever this subtle and wonderful Golden Light Sutra is present, whether in the present or future, in cities, villages, mountains, forests, or empty places, or in the palaces of kings, wherever this sutra spreads, I will go there with these twenty-eight divisions of great ghosts and spirits, conceal my form, follow and protect those who expound the Dharma, eliminate all evils and bring them peace and security;

original: 及聽法眾——若男、若女、童男、童女——於是經中乃至得聞一如來名、一菩薩名、及此經典首題名字，受持讀誦，我當隨侍宿衛擁護，悉滅其惡，令得安隱；
analyzed: 及聽法眾——若男、若女、童男、童女——於是經中乃至得聞一如來名、一菩薩名、及此經典首題名字，受持讀誦，我當隨侍宿衛擁護，悉滅其惡，令得安隱；
translated: And for the assembly listening to the Dharma - whether male, female, boys or girls - if they can hear the name of a single Tathagata, the name of a single Bodhisattva, or even the title of this sutra, and uphold and recite it, I will attend and guard them, eliminate their evils, and bring them peace and security;

original: 及國邑、城郭、若王宮殿、舍宅空處皆亦如是。
analyzed: 及國邑、城郭、若王宮殿、舍宅空處皆亦如是。
translated: And for the countries, cities, towns, royal palaces, houses, and empty places, it shall be the same.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 何因緣故我名散脂鬼神大將？
analyzed: 何因緣故我名散脂鬼神大將？
translated: What is the reason for my name as the great general of the ghost spirits Saṃjīva?

original: 唯然，世尊！
analyzed: 唯然，世尊！
translated: Yes, World-Honored One!

original: 自當證知。
analyzed: 自當證知。
translated: I will personally testify to this.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我知一切法、一切緣法、了一切法，知法分齊，如法安住一切法如性，於一切法含受一切法。
analyzed: 我知一切法、一切緣法、了一切法，知法分齊，如法安住一切法如性，於一切法含受一切法。
translated: I understand all dharmas, all conditioned dharmas, and have realized all dharmas. I know the limits of the dharmas and abide in all dharmas as they truly are. I encompass and contain all dharmas.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我現見不可思議智光、不可思議智炬、不可思議智行、不可思議智聚、不可思議智境。
analyzed: 我現見不可思議智光、不可思議智炬、不可思議智行、不可思議智聚、不可思議智境。
translated: I now see the inconceivable light of wisdom, the inconceivable torch of wisdom, the inconceivable practice of wisdom, the inconceivable accumulation of wisdom, and the inconceivable realm of wisdom.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我於諸法正解、正觀、得正分別、正解於緣、正能覺了。
analyzed: 我於諸法正解、正觀、得正分別、正解於緣、正能覺了。
translated: I have correct understanding, correct observation, correct discrimination, and correct understanding of conditions regarding all dharmas. I am able to correctly realize them.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 以是故名散脂大將。
analyzed: 以是故名散脂大將。
translated: For this reason, I am called the great general Saṃjīva.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我散脂大將令說法者莊嚴言辭、辯不斷絕、眾味精氣從毛孔入、充益身力、心進勇銳、成就不可思議智慧、入正憶念，如是等事悉令具足，心無疲厭，身受諸樂，心得歡喜。
analyzed: 我散脂大將令說法者莊嚴言辭、辯不斷絕、眾味精氣從毛孔入、充益身力、心進勇銳、成就不可思議智慧、入正憶念，如是等事悉令具足，心無疲厭，身受諸樂，心得歡喜。
translated: I, General Saṃghāta, will cause the expounders of the Dharma to have adorned speech, uninterrupted eloquence, and the essence of various flavors enter through their pores, nourishing their physical strength, invigorating their minds, and accomplishing inconceivable wisdom. They will enter right mindfulness, and all such matters will be fully possessed, their minds free from fatigue, their bodies experiencing various pleasures, and their minds attaining joy.

original: 以是之故，能為眾生廣說是經。
analyzed: 以是之故，能為眾生廣說是經。
translated: For this reason, they will be able to extensively expound this sūtra for sentient beings.

original: 若諸眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，說法之人為是眾生，閻浮提內廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
analyzed: 若諸眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，說法之人為是眾生，閻浮提內廣宣流布是妙經典，令不斷絕。
translated: If sentient beings have planted various roots of goodness in the presence of hundreds of thousands of Buddhas, the expounders of the Dharma will, for the sake of these sentient beings, widely proclaim and spread this wonderful sūtra throughout Jambudvīpa, causing it to continue without interruption.

original: 無量眾生聞是經已，當得不可思議智聚、攝取不可思議功德之聚，於未來世無量百千劫人天之中常受快樂、於未來世值遇諸佛、疾得證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提、一切眾苦三惡趣分永滅無餘。
